name: iCoreBreach
description:
iCoreBreach is THE brand-new futuristic "anti-gravity" racing game with combat-based gameplay. Accept the ultimate challenge - finish the most difficult racing game for iOS!

* SPECIAL OFFER - INTRODUCTORY PRICE *


6 EXCITING ANTI-GRAVITY SHIPS
iCoreBreach offers 6 great ships from easy maneuverable to rigid but ultra fast - and an unbelievable bonus ship.

6 RACE TRACKS & REVERSE MODE
You can choose from 6 beautiful, detailed and futuristic tracks of varying difficulty in both directions to prove your skills.

6 POWERFUL COMBAT WEAPONS
Combat your enemies using 6 powerful weapons including the deadly "Zeus Plasma Cannon" or choose "Space Nitro".

UNIQUE GAMEPLAY & GRAPHICS
iCoreBreach features a good looking high contrast graphics style and offers exclusive gameplay ideas like the "CoreMode".
Advanced users can choose the in-ship camera mode for mind bending speed sensation (Warning: can cause dizziness).

CAREER-MODE & STORY-LINE
Fight your evil opponents while racing towards world domination in the thrilling story-mode.
Win trophy money to upgrade your weapons and tune your ships to be even better.

THE SOUNDTRACK OF 1000-MPH RACING
iCoreBreach offers a powerful and varied 50-minute soundtrack to support the immersive gameplay.

ONLINE TIME-ATTACK
Compete globally with the internet high-scores! Your lap times are automatically uploaded after each game, without needing any account creation.


*** WEBSITE ***
Get more information here:

http://corebreach.corecode.at
